Radistor ripped free and rolled across the ground. It seemed that the gesta=
lt was acrobatic, kind of like how the bio cards always portray the Beast W=
ars gestalts. He stands up.

re in history. Deemos single handedly won a war, and his destruction could =
mean yours, for all anyone knows.

Radistor acted like he was going to atta=
ck, then wheels flipped out of his feet and he spun around in the other dir=
ection, running from the battle...
